answers.answer: Idk....if he is big he may be early. I wouldn't be alarmed if the doc wasn't

Same thing happened to me a couple days ago. I was having stomach tightening and brown discharge, I am 33 wks.  I called my Dr. and was told to go through emergency. Results were premature labor with contractions 2-4 minutes apart. I needed 3 shots to stop the contractions and an iv for dehydration. I would contact my Dr to find out what exactly is best for you to do. Good Luck hope everything is fine with you both.

You can loose your mucus plug all throughout your pregnancy. It regenerates itself and grows back. So you could very well go overdue or have him a few weeks early. Size really is no indication if you will deliver early or not. Also keep in mind that the measurements can be wrong!!

question: i called my Dr & left a message describing some symptoms i've been having (brown discharge/some pain) & she emailed me back & said i'm starting to lose my mucus plug. but i'm only 33 weeks. should i be concerned? i also have diabetes so the baby is weighing more than he should. could this mean he'll be early?
title: losing mucus plug?
